uk.ac.nott.cs.g53dia.library

Class LitterAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.nott.cs.g53dia.library.LitterAgent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DemoLitterAgent

    public abstract class LitterAgent
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract base class for Tankers in the standard Environment.

      • senseAndAct

        public abstract Action senseAndAct(Cell[][] view,
                                   long timestep)
        Sub-classes must implement this method to provide the "brains" for the LitterAgent.
        Parameters:
        view - The cells the agent can currently see. * @param timestep The current timestep.
        Returns:
        an action to perform
